mapper.insert: MERGE INTO TBL_CART USING DUAL ON (M_USERID = #{m_userid} AND P_NUM = #{p_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CART_ACOUNT = CART_ACOUNT + #{cart_acount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CART_CODE, P_NUM, M_USERID, CART_ACOUNT) VALUES (SEQ_CART_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{p_num}, #{m_userid}, #{cart_acount})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_CODE, C.M_USERID, C.P_NUM, C.CART_ACOUNT, M.M_POINT, P.P_BUY_OK, P.P_COST, P.P_IMAGE, P.P_IMAGE_DATEFOLDER, P.P_NAME, P.P_DISCOUNT, P.P_COMPANY FROM TBL_CART C INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON C.P_NUM = P.P_NUM INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON C.M_USERID = M.M_USERID WHERE C.M_USERID = #{m_userid}
